summary.span: 命名空间提供使您能够生成强类型的事件的类型和成员，这些事件利用 Windows (ETW) 事件追踪进行事件捕捉。

span.span: The namespace provides types and members that enable you to create strongly typed events to be captured by event tracing for Windows (ETW).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强类型的事件由名称标识，并说明负载。A strongly typed event is identified by name and contains payload descriptions. 你可以发现的程序可以通过使用反射来生成的事件的列表。You can discover the list of events that a program can produce by using reflection.
